attributes.action: Investigate the investigatory tactics of the BBC
attributes.additional_details: The BBC follow their own interests rather than those of the licence payers. This is not a good position to have in relation to their mandatory subscribers. I am going to request numerous details under FOI, to prove this fact.
attributes.background: It is obvious to many, that the BBC do not report in a balanced unbias format. Panorama is about to be exposed as criminal in application.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

If you have a complaint about a BBC programme this would be the responsibility of the BBC and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You can complain to the BBC here:

http://www.bbc.co.uk/faqs/complaints_process

You may also like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234797
